name: G.S.S.
description:
GSS is a Shoot em up made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 4.

You control a spaceship, and go through 3 levels, with optional upgrades between them.

Controls:
SPACE/ENTER,KP_5: Shoot
W/UP/KP_8: Move up
S/DOWN/KP_2: Move down
P: pause
ESC: exit

There are two versions:
gss_silent.zip contains no sounds, while gss_with_sounds.zip does have audio.

All the sounds are from the resources page, made by Trix.

For more information, read the README.txt.

The game is made in c++, using SDL2.
